message.content: Most men in Jordan have a negative perception of divorce. They generally view it as a last resort and believe that it should only be considered in extreme cases. Men in Jordan tend to prioritize maintaining the stability of the family unit and preserving the institution of marriage. They often perceive divorce as a failure and a source of shame, both for themselves and their families. Additionally, many men in Jordan hold traditional values and believe that divorce goes against societal norms and religious teachings.
